languages.text: "Мятеж возглавляет некто Заря, пророк или пророчица, которой последователи приписывают мистические силы".
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."
languages.original_text: "Мятеж возглавляет некто Заря, пророк или пророчица, которой последователи приписывают мистические силы".

traits.locale_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who according to his or her followers possesses mystical powers."
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who according to his or her followers possesses mystical powers."
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."
"The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

languages.text: "Der Aufstand wird von einer gewissen Aurora geleitet, einer Prophetin, die ihren Anhängern zufolge mystische Kräfte besitzt."
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: "Der Aufstand wird von einer gewissen Aurora geleitet, einer Prophetin, die ihren Anhängern zufolge mystische Kräfte besitzt."

languages.text: « L'insurrection est dirigée par une certaine Aurore, une prophétesse qui, selon ses partisans, possède des pouvoirs mystiques. »
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: « L'insurrection est dirigée par une certaine Aurore, une prophétesse qui, selon ses partisans, possède des pouvoirs mystiques. »

languages.text: “这场叛乱由一个叫‘极光’的人煽动。她的追随者声称她是一位先知，拥有神秘的力量。”
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: “这场叛乱由一个叫‘极光’的人煽动。她的追随者声称她是一位先知，拥有神秘的力量。”

languages.text: 「反乱者のリーダーはオーロラという預言者で、信者の話では、神秘的な力を持っているらしい」
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱者のリーダーはオーロラという預言者で、信者の話では、神秘的な力を持っているらしい」

languages.text: «La insurgencia está encabezada por una tal Aurora, una profeta que, según sus seguidores, posee poderes místicos».
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: «La insurgencia está encabezada por una tal Aurora, una profeta que, según sus seguidores, posee poderes místicos».

languages.text: "Asilerin başında Aurora diye birisi var. Müritlerine göre bu şahıs, mistik güçlere sahip bir peygambermiş."
languages.original_text: "The insurgency is headed by a certain Aurora, a prophet who, according to their followers, possesses mystical powers."

traits.locale_text: "Asilerin başında Aurora diye birisi var. Müritlerine göre bu şahıs, mistik güçlere sahip bir peygambermiş."
